metadata.title: CVE-2017-17846 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Enigmail before 1.9.9. Regular expressions areexploitable for Denial of Service, because of attempts to match arbitrarilylong strings, aka TBE-01-003.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

enigmail - 2:1.9.9-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: enigmail package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.9.9-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
